name: Cubix Mania for Raspberry Pi
description:
A great brain-teaser for puzzle lovers! Line of the columns of pieces by threes. Line up rows, columns, or diagonals to invoke a chain-reaction and make the pieces disappear. A classic puzzle game that never loses it's addictiveness! Play through different scenarios such as Under the Sea, The Zen Garden, The Diamond Mine and more!

Features

  • 5 Awesome Boards
  • 1 and 2 player modes
  • Super addicting game-play
  • Cool soundtrack
